summary: A mod that completely re-textures steel armor ( excluding the steel shield and the light steel helmet)
descriptionHtml:
This basic re-texture breathes new life into your Steel Armor.
-The horns on the helmet have had a complete color change, resembling a higher quality horn
-All metal surfaces have been brightened, and have had scratches and slight distress added to them
-All fur has had a complete color change as well, resembling less of an \"old and dusty\" quality, and more of a \"warm, protective\" quality
-Every individual stitch in the armor has been gone over with new color and detail, making your armor look handmade (as it was) rather than riveted together in a Nordic factory
-All sides of the belt(s) have had a re-texture as well, bring new color and richness to your outfit.

Articles of clothing/armor that have had a complete color enhancement and re-texture include:
Steel Horned Helmet
Steel Armor
Steel Gauntlets
Steel Boots

I will be doing a female version soon, and will add more pieces of clothing and armor
=========================================================================================
1: Installation:

	Download with Nexus mod manager (recommended)
   
   Installation (manually):
	-Take the \"textures folder\" and extract to you desktop
	-Find your armor folder (local disc:C/program filesx64 (or not64 depending on your OS)/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data/textures/armor
	-delete your \"steel\" (you may keep it in the recycle bin if you wish to uninstall)
	-with your NEW \"steel\" folder, drop the folder in your \"armor\" folder

So you will drop your folder here: .../common/skyrim/data/textures/armor   <drop in there!

***upon startup you should have your new armor!!!***
		ENJOY! :D
=========================================================================================
Please endorse and share in the fun!
thanks again
-MorninJerky
author: MorninJerky
